metadata.synopsis: Drider pauses the escort because someone was left behind. Drider's tone is a little sharp - it's his responsibility to make sure the caravan he's escorting gets to its destination safely.
metadata.how_to_trigger: (Escort behaviour WIP)Once is done, start the escort and move away from the caravan.

0.speaker: Kar'niss
0.text: Return to the light! Do not stray!
0.context: NodeContext: Drider notices the player has left the safety of the caravan and wandered off into dangerous ground

1.speaker: Kar'niss
1.text: Do the fools want to die in the dark, Majesty?
1.context: NodeContext: Drider notices the player has left the safety of the caravan and wandered off into dangerous ground

2.speaker: Kar'niss
2.text: Come back! They must stay in the light, Majesty.
2.context: NodeContext: Drider notices the player has left the safety of the caravan and wandered off into dangerous ground. First phrase is shouted into darkness, second line is delivered to his god, in his usual crazed fashion. Quieter on second phrase.

3.speaker: Kar'niss
3.text: They leave us again? Very well, my queen - we will wait.
3.context: NodeContext: Tiny bit resentfully. You're running out of patience
